text: Dominic Adam Brunt (born 15 April 1970) is an English actor, director and producer. He is best known for portraying the role of Paddy Kirk in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale, which he has played since 1997. ==Other works== He and Emmerdale co-star Mark Charnock, who plays Marlon Dingle, produce the annual Zombie Film Festival at the Leeds Cottage Road cinema. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Cheshire
title: Dominic Brunt
